name: Encore 10 secondes avant d'attraper le Grand Maître
name_original: Encore 10 secondes avant d'attraper le Grand Maître
description:
Encore 10 secondes avant d’attraper le Grand Maître
This game with a title way too long is a french Point & Click game with a little story. You are on the laptop of a chief cult to find incriminating clues. The electricity is unstable, the laptop has run out of battery, but you can avoid the power cuts. There are many references to certain French TV series.

Gameplay
Most actions are done with the mouse. Thanks to the smartphone, You will be able to take screenshots of evidence against the cult leader as well as avoid power cuts every 10 seconds.

Credits
Rerat Maxence (first solo jam :D)

Tools
-Unreal Engine 4
-Photoshop (a lot)
